title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7310.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7310.1 - Policy

State Regulations
(a) Adequate health
care and health care services shall be provided to all youth to promote the
well-being of youth through the prevention, detection, treatment and management
of disease and disability. (b) Consistent with the requirements of this Part, the medical director shall
develop written policies and procedures that govern facility health services. The written policies and procedures shall be reviewed annually and updated as
needed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7310.1

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
